unnormalised: Insiders spotted Alia touring a luxury apartment complex in Bandra West on 27/10/2024 around 14:30 hrs, sans Ranbir. Could this be the couple finally seeking their own space away from the watchful eyes of Neetu Singh?

unnormalised: And that's not all! A popular gossip blog claimed a heated discussion was overheard on the sets of Brahmastra 2 (yes, it's still happening!) on 1/1/2025 at 03:00 AM.
